WebhookResponse.title: WebhookResponse
WebhookResponse.description: Represents the response received from a webhook.

id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook response.

status.description: The status of the webhook response (e.g., pending, completed, failed).

message.description: A descriptive message associated with the webhook response.

initialResponse.description: The initial response from the service that triggered the webhook.

responseBody.description: The full response body received from the webhook endpoint.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the webhook response was received.

/webhookResponses/{webhookResponseId}.description: Stores webhook responses. The webhookResponseId is the unique ID for each response.
